name: Tick Away
description:
This is a game project made for Ludum Jam 49 within 2days.

Tick Away is narrative driven game about delivering a time bomb that make you think of the past. 

Also, sometime, life is just as unstable as a time bomb.

You will need to help the main character stabilize and defuse a dangerous tilt fuse bomb delivered to his locker. Reveal the story behind the time bomb as you resolve the crisis. 

The game consist of two part, 

part 1 is delivering the bomb to the defusing location, 

part 2 is defusing the bomb.

Team: 

Yubing Xie, Cheng Guo, Zhongrui Liu

In the start menu, click `ticking` to start the game.

Control: 

1. Part 1: A, D or left/right arrow keys to move left or right

up, `press frequently up/down arrow keys` to lift or down arm to stable the bomb.

2. Part 2: 

mouse movement and left click.
